description:
If you or a loved one has been injured in an accident caused by the negligence of another individual, you might be entitled to receive monetary compensation from the at-fault party's insurance carrier through a personal injury lawsuit. An established law firm such as GWC Injury Lawyers LLC can answer your questions and guide you through the legal process. Call to schedule a free consultation with a personal injury attorney at our Libertyville, Illinois, office.

Illinois' Largest Injury And Workers' Compensation Firm

Since the firm's inception in 1977, we have built around concepts of exceptional client service, prompt communication, thorough preparation and honest answers. With more than 30 lawyers on our staff of dedicated professionals, our firm is prepared to handle even the most complex cases for our injured clients.

  • Motor vehicle accidents: Including car accidents, truck accidents and motorcycle accidents
  • Medical malpractice cases: Including surgical negligence, birth injury and pharmacy error cases
  • Premises liability: Including negligent security, slip-and-fall, and trip-and-fall accidents.
  • Products liability: Including defective power tools, toys and pharmaceuticals
  • Workers' compensation: Including denied, delayed or devalued claims

Through the history of our practice, we have become accustomed to representing clients who are facing a lifetime of medical attention or devastating conditions. Injuries such as traumatic brain injuries, spinal cord injuries, neck injuries and paralysis can be life-altering. We will explore every legal avenue of compensation for lost wages, medical bills, property damage, and pain and suffering to ensure you recover the maximum compensation possible.

To learn more about how the law firm of GWC Injury Lawyers LLC can help, call or email any of our convenient office locations. We offer free consultations and services in English, Spanish and Polish.
